name: Claude Data
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's data knowledge work plugin
long_description: This agent helps teams analyze and interpret data to turn questions into clear, actionable conclusions and stakeholder-ready summaries. Users can explore datasets, validate data quality, run statistical analyses and SQL queries, and create concise visualizations or interactive dashboards to communicate findings. It also assists in structuring analytical workflows and generating clear explanations of results to support decision making. The agent is intended for data-focused tasks such as exploration, validation, visualization, dashboard building, and producing reproducible analytical outputs.
